alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 03 at 1:51AM MST until January 03 at 11:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches, highest amounts generally along the Pine Ridge and extending into southern Jackson county. * WHERE...Oglala Lakota County, Jackson County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Pine Ridge Reservation. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected. This will create dangerous conditions. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.
